statements: DELETE FROM debtor_profiles WHERE payment_status = 'Overdue' AND aging > 30;
DELETE FROM debtors WHERE debtor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM debtors WHERE debtor_id = 100 AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM debtors WHERE aging_days > 30 OR debt_amount < 500.00;

DELETE FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount < 1000 OR payment_method = 'Credit Card';
